definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Prohibition against edibility. Do not empty into drains.
sentences.chinese: 禁止服食，不要倒入下水道。

sentences.english: Objective To study the technique to control rodents in sewers of urban residential areas.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究武漢市居民區下水道滅鼠技術。

sentences.english: It’s from the sewer and it’s called hogwash oil.
sentences.chinese: 來自下水道，也被稱爲地溝油。

sentences.english: This dissertation is to develop a late-model sewer system named vacuum sewer system.
sentences.chinese: 本文旨在開發一套新型真空下水道系統。

sentences.english: Any situation in which raw sewage is backing up into the home.
sentences.chinese: 下水道的水倒流回家中。

sentences.english: The Japanese researchers isolated proteins from bacteria in sewage.
sentences.chinese: 日本研究者從下水道污物中分離出蛋白質。

sentences.english: The current status of sewer net in Paris and the measures for desilting were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了巴黎下水道的現狀及其清淤防淤措施。

sentences.english: Check to see that water and sewage lines are intact before using the toilet.
sentences.chinese: 入廁前要檢查水管與下水道管道，確保它們完好無損。

sentences.english: a lock which stuck, drains clogged with my thick hair.
sentences.chinese: 一撮粘住的毛髮，下水道被我濃密的頭髮堵住。

sentences.english: Fishing some sewage rats for dinner?
sentences.chinese: 釣一些下水道的大老鼠作爲晚餐？

sentences.english: About 10 catfish were found swimming in the sewer.
sentences.chinese: 在下水道里發現了大約有10只的鮎魚。

sentences.english: Something quite illogic, if these two juxtaposed reverse direction sewers are looked at within the same big picture.
sentences.chinese: 從大處看，二條逆向的下水道並列，似很不合邏輯。

sentences.english: The sewer is silted up by foulness , and the waste water is everywhere on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 下水道被髒物阻塞了，污水流得滿地都是。

sentences.english: Even the plant's manhole covers are stamped 'Foxconn.'
sentences.chinese: 甚至園區的下水道井蓋上也印有“富士康”字樣。

definition: chamber pot/wooden pan used as toilet/toilet bowl
